title: Tangent line approximation for time lake is safe

content.question: An investigator uses the tangent line approximation to P(t) at t = 0 as a model for the amount of pollutant in the lake. At what t does this model predict that the lake becomes safe?

frqParts.text: An investigator uses the tangent line approximation to P(t) at t = 0 as a model for the amount of pollutant in the lake. At what t does this model predict that the lake becomes safe?

topic.text: 2.2: Defining the Derivative of a Function and Using Derivative Notation

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Identify an appropriate mathematical rule or procedure based on the relationship between concepts (e.g., rate of change and accumulation) or processes (e.g., differentiation and its inverse process, anti-differentiation) to solve problems.
